A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: It’s a good movie\, very entertaining and engaging but as a SW fan I feel it wasted several important characters giving into the wishes of Disney to move on to their own SW. I find it disrespectful that not only it completely destroys the Skywalker bloodline\, it leaves it in the shadows leaving Kyle Ren as the last Skywalker (since Carrie Fisher is dead and eventually princes Leia will be too). They wasted Solo\, and now Luke and Snooke after they build up so much anticipation for both characters. I don’t agree with completely disregarding what made te backbone of SW in order to make something “new” when they already had the new upcoming trilogy to have their own Disney-SW. what a waste
